titles.title: A concurrent resolution supporting the goals and ideals of a world day of remembrance for road crash victims.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

action.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Inouye without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 408.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/4/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Supports the goals and ideals of a world day of remembrance for road crash victims.
